title: Finding the Determinant
text: The determinant is given by $$a d-b c$$. For this matrix, the determinant is $$\frac{1}{\left(-2-6\right)}$$ which is $$-8$$

title: Multiplying the Determinant with the Changed Matrix
text: We must modify the matrix into the form $$\begin{bmatrix} d & -b \\ -c & a \end{bmatrix}$$. This means we now have $$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & -2 \\ -3 & -2 \end{bmatrix}$$. Dividing this by $$-8$$ gives us $$(-1/8)*\begin{bmatrix} 1 & -2 \\ -3 & -2 \end{bmatrix}$$
